   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 2008 ਦਾ 6 ਹਫ਼ਤਾ
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 1995 ਦਾ 51 ਹਫ਼ਤਾ
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = -10 ਦਾ 37 ਹਫ਼ਤਾ


=head2 Miscellaneous

=head3 Prefers 24 hour time?

No

=head3 Local first day of the week

1 (ਸੋਮਵਾਰ)

=head1 SUPPORT

See L<DateTime::Locale>.

=cut
